diff_act: 5.include the train identification number and other relevant details
6.produce a ringing tone or beep sound
7.display a flashing light or text message on the display screen
8.indicate that the call has been established

regen.absent_element: specification for handling network issues during call connection
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide an audible and visual indication to the driver if network issues prevent the call from connecting, including details of the nature of the issue if available.

regen.absent_element: specification for handling network issues during call setup
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide an audible and visual indication to the driver if a network issue occurs during call setup, including details of the issue if available.

regen.absent_element: specification for handling network issues during call setup
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide an audible and visual indication to the driver if a network issue occurs during call setup, and attempt to reconnect or prompt the driver for further action.

label: The functional identity includes the engine number, if no train number is available.
absence: situation of no train number is available
